title: Sale of donated pharmaceuticals or health care supplies, prohibited; fines
context: [ยง328C-3] Sale of donated pharmaceuticals or health care supplies, prohibited; fines. (a) No person or organization shall sell, or offer for sale, any pharmaceutical or health care supply donated or distributed under this chapter. (b) Any violation of this section is punishable by a fine not to exceed $1,000. [L 1997, c 337, pt of ยง2]
